sentences.en: "What a dump!" Christabel said, standing in the doorway of the youth hostel.
sentences.cn: “真够脏乱的！”克丽丝特布尔站在青年旅社的门口说道。

sentences.en: A short history of the world youth hostel movement.
sentences.cn: 一段关于世界青年旅馆的运动简历.

sentences.en: Go straight down to this Y . W . C . A . hostel and fetch Huei - fang home!
sentences.cn: 你马上到女青年会寄宿舍去同四妹来!

sentences.en: He says he's staying at a Youth Hostel.
sentences.cn: 他说他现住在一家青年招待所.

sentences.en: He'd been working at the local hostel for the handicapped on a voluntary basis.
sentences.cn: 他曾在当地的残疾人救助站当过义工。

sentences.en: I lived in a hostel while I was a student.
sentences.cn: 我求学期间住在青年招待所里.

sentences.en: I lived in hostel while I was a student.
sentences.cn: 玛丽:“我刚到苏格兰,我住在一家青年招待所. ”

sentences.en: I think she should pack, which makes the whole mess hostel bar!
sentences.cn: 我想她应该在收拾行李, 弄得整个宿舍一团糟吧!

sentences.en: I've selected small mouldy room with a low ceiling in a hostel next to Yunlin's.
sentences.cn: 我看上一间又低,又小,又霉的的东房,这是在云霖的隔壁一家叫大元的公寓里.

sentences.en: Most hostel tenants would prefer single to shared rooms.
sentences.cn: 住在招待所的人大多更喜欢单人间，而不想和别人共住一间。

sentences.en: The 260-bed hostel on Second Street, just two blocks from the beach, had come highly recommended by an Angeleno I’d met on a recent trip to the Caribbean.
sentences.cn: 这家有260张床位的招待所离海滩只有两个街区，是我在最近一次去加勒比海的旅途上遇见的一个洛杉矶人极力推荐的。

sentences.en: The hostel is heavily reliant upon charity.
sentences.cn: 这家收容所在很大程度上依赖赞助。

sentences.en: The stones for the hostel foundations were brought in from nearby.
sentences.cn: 建造招待所的基石是从附近运来的.

sentences.en: the warden of a youth hostel

words.tran_cn: 招待周到地；亲切地；善于款待地

phrases.tran_cn: 青年招待所；青年（学生）宿舍

trans.tran_cn: 旅社，招待所，〈英古〉旅馆，〈英〉大学宿舍
trans.tran_en: a place where people can stay and eat fairly cheaply
